name: Traffic Racer Crash
description:
Traffic Racer Crash is a game in which you will drive an ambulance that will go on a straight road, which will be full of vehicles that will make your way difficult and you should avoid.
Traffic Racer Crash is the perfect game to hang out in a relaxed way, without being a game with great difficulty and to train your reflexes a bit.

The difficulty of the game lies in several aspects:

-The ambulance increases speed as time goes by, that will make the longer you have been driving the faster you will go and the harder it will be not to collide with other vehicles.

-Vehicles can also drive recklessly, for them you will have to anticipate this, maintain distances and know how to place, all this at great speed

-The crashes can make you lose the part, depending on the speed, the size of the vehicle with which you crash and with your health at the time of the crash

How to play:

You simply need the mouse to play, with the mouse you will move through the menus and play.
To drive you only need the "A" and "D" keys to move left and right respectively, apart, you have the nitro button on the right side of the screen that you can activate by clicking on it with the mouse.
